Message: hey so sad news I hadn't slept all night because of my insomnia and I feel like I have zero energy today I might pass out any second can we postpone it

Of course, I understand your exhaustion affects focus and performance. Let's reschedule when you're well-rested, taking care of yourself is key. We'll look forward to a more energized session then. Stay positive, rest well.

Hey so sadly I didn't get to sleep all night because of my insomnia so I have zero energy today, and i feel like I might pass out any second would it  be possible if we postpone trainig session to tomorrow?

Absolutely, I recognize how crucial sleep is for your wellbeing and ability to excel in our sessions. It's best to prioritize rest now, so we can give our all tomorrow. I'll rearrange our plans for a more successful day ahead. Take good care and rest deeply.
on the way here my public transportation got into a terrible accident and the boss flipped sideways making other people fall on me I think I broke my leg and I can't move

Oh dear, first priority is your health and safety. Don't attempt to move or put extra strain on that injury. Emergency services need to be contacted immediately. Once stabilized, we'll adapt our training routine to suit your recovery progress. Be strong, focus on healing right now.
